654170.name: Black Squad - EA FREE TIMED WEAPON PACKAGE 1
654170.description:
Free timed weapon for all Early Access players.
One DLC per account.

Please try various rifles and sniper guns

S1014 (15 days)
R5 GL (15 days)
SIZ556XI CARBON FG (15 days)
EF88 GL (15 days)
CZ805 FG (15 days)
TYPE95 FG (15 days)
SCAR-H (15 days)
MK46 (15 days)
MSR (15 days)
654170.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 越南语, 日语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 韩语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
